channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-16127] In ipc.Client, put a new connection could happen after stop
item.description: In getConnection(..), running can be initially true but becomes false before putIfAbsent.
item.summary: In ipc.Client, put a new connection could happen after stop

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

This message was automatically generated.

Nice to see some new uses of the java 8 l-expressions; good to use them where possible.

Client

L475: include the toString value of the caught IOE in the new one, so if the full stack trace is lost, the root cause is preserved

L1360: you've removed all sleeps here entirely. Is that OK?

+1 pending the change and the confirmation
ps: set your version info for where you intend to apply this

> L475: include the toString value of the caught IOE in the new one, so if the full stack trace is lost, the root cause is preserved

Sure.

> L1360: you've removed all sleeps here entirely. Is that OK?

Yes, we use wait-notify instead of sleep to minimize the sleep/wait time.

Thanks for the review. Here is a new patch: c16127_20190220.patch

> ps: set your version info for where you intend to apply this

Just have set target version to 3.1.2. Thanks.
